item.title: Chapter 8. Introduction to MySQL
item.description: Creating a MySQL Database login with user root sudo mysql -u root -p ; is used for ending commands | Mysql prompt | Meaning | | ———— | ——————————————————- | | mysql> | Ready and waiting for a command | | -> | Waiting for the next line of a command | | ‘> | | | “> | | | `> | | | /> | Waiting for the next line for a comment started with / |
